title: Fromm Softees Microfiber Salon Hair Towels - Fast Drying Towel Use at Home, Spa, Barber - 16" x 29" - Extra Durable and Absorbent - Pink, 45033, 10 Count (pack of 1)
features: MULTIPURPOSE TOWELS: Fromm Softees are our trademarked microfiber towels designed for salons, spas and barber shops. Also great for a variety of personal uses including at home or the gym and general purpose cleaning

HIGH PERFORMANCE MICROFIBER: The soft, friction-free material is gentle and non-abrasive on fragile wet hair and skin. This lightweight towel dries 3 times faster than cotton and is lint-free, making it ideal for nail salons and services. The fabric weight is 2.1lbs per dozen
ULTRA DURABLE: Softees withstand frequent machine washing and last up to 6 times longer than cotton towels
DRIES HAIR FASTER: When using Fromm Softees as a hair wrap turban on wet hair, it absorbs water quickly, which means less blow drying time and less heat damage to hair
CONVENIENT SIZE: The towels each measure 16" wide x 29" long and come in a pack of 10 towels
description: Fromm Softees are our trademarked microfiber towels designed for use in salons, spas and barber shops. Super absorbent Softees lift water particles and lock them deep within the fibers; after being towel dried, hair requires less blow dry time which reduces heat damage and frizziness. The soft, friction-free material is gentle and non-abrasive on fragile wet hair and skin. Light microfiber dries 3x faster than cotton. Lint-free Softees are excellent for nail salons. Ultra durable material withstands frequent machine washing and lasts up to 6 times longer than cotton towels. They come as a set of 10 towels each measuring 16 x 29 inches. They are machine washable, dryer friendly and will not shrink.
